Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between SW-EIC Accept and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to be done after Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time until Awaiting Assignment to Batch is performed following First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total resolution time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared to time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Elapsed time between Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurred earlier in the trace
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch relative to the duration of the entire review cycle starting from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to be done after First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average waiting time to the Awaiting Assignment to Batch following SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in comparison with time from RW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Cycle Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch measured from the immediately preceding Manuscript Export Succeeded event
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in complex revision variants involving SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
